Learning Resources

Learning Resources Help

  • In the Learning Resources widget you can review or add new learning documents, experts and widgets assigned to the goal and learning indicators.
  • To see the list of learning indicators assigned to the goal click on its name.
  • To see the list of learning documents assigned to particular learning indicator click on its name.
  • To see the list of experts assigned to particular learning indicator click on its name.
  • To see the list of widgets assigned to particular learning indicator click on its name.
  • To add new document click on Add new document menu item. In the Add a new Document view you can import name, description and url from the Boost Viewer widget or enter it in appropriate text fields. Click on Save button to save changes.
  • To add new expert click on Add new expert menu item.
    • In the Add a new Expert enter the expert contact infotmations in appropriate text fields.
    • Click on Save button to save changes.
  • To add new widget click on Add new widget menu item.
    • In the Add a new Widget enter the widget name and its Url address in appropriate text fields.
    • Click on Save button to save changes.
  • To see expert or widget informations, click on icon.
